title: 2 years since last Zac skin. Cmon riot hear us out
body: If not a skin at least a chroma pack! I've had Special Weapon ZAc for over a year now and it kinda gets boring and i get bullied by people saying its crap knock thier socks off with an amazing skin. http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1421028002814/caz.jpg for example is an amazing skin. (not my skin)

replies.body: The skin doesnt match the blob theme, id rather them working on the oce server and bugs (etc) then a zac skin. Tho it is overdue like alot of things (yorick update)
his blobs can be clouds???

> [{quoted}](name=Unstable Matter,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-26T08:47:00.019+0000)
>
> his blobs can be clouds???

It wouldnt look right at all, clouds that bounce,get pulled,slide, seems stupid lel
you know what you're right but u have to admit they shouldn't be making another teemo skin when zac hasnt got one in 2 years

> [{quoted}](name=Unstable Matter,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-26T08:52:52.364+0000)
>
> you know what you're right but u have to admit they shouldn't be making another teemo skin when zac hasnt got one in 2 years

true dat
they shouldn't be making any skin with the state the servers are in atm
Your right get those 3D modelers, texture makers and splash artists down to the server room stat so they can do server maintenance and and coding ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
haha xD
lmao think before i post? read my comment and then read your comment and then slap your face with your palm

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-26T08:39:47.417+0000)
>
>  id rather them working on the oce server and bugs (etc) then a zac skin. Tho it is overdue like alot of things (yorick update)

yes coz the same team doing visual design would be the same team doing server maintenance, they have brought out 30 odd skins in the last couple of months

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-05-26T10:31:44.903+0000)
>
> yes coz the same team doing visual design would be the same team doing server maintenance, they have brought out 30 odd skins in the last couple of months

The skins released (IMHO) Are trash, and for the champs  that really dont need them. And yes the people that work on Visual designs WORK WITH  the others bcz the update/rework  SHOULD be a visual one.

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-26T10:36:12.905+0000)
>
> **The skins released (IMHO) Are trash**, and for the champs  that really dont need them.

Even if you hate the way they look or the themes of them no one can deny the fact that the amount of effort they are putting into the new skins is only increasing (as it has been for some time) so many these days have animation changes compared to a few years ago and the animations in the latest set of skins in particular have been extremely high quality.

I would agree though that Riot definitely needs to re-evaluate there priorities and get some skins out for the forgotten champions.

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-26T10:36:12.905+0000)
>
> The skins released (IMHO) Are trash, and for the champs  that really dont need them. And yes the people that work on Visual designs WORK WITH  the others bcz the update/rework  SHOULD be a visual one.

how are they trash ? some of the best skins I've seen, it's not as if they have a team meeting every morning to decide what they are doing for the day, even if they didn't have the time/resources to create a new skin they could easier throw it out to the public for ideas which they seem to be getting better at

Thats sick 
Something like that but with Elements, Like his ult go though Fire, Earth, Water, Air.  his q can be a spike with Earth rock something looks like malphites, His w can be air the sound and effect of like clouds and storms idk, His e can be water he turns into a water blob and hits the ground and his passive could be fire coming back together. 
I find heaps of things that could work but yeh is it possible to make into a skin…
AMAZING IDEA

> [{quoted}](name=ImDuhN00B,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-26T09:42:27.832+0000)
>
> Thats sick 
> Something like that but with Elements, Like his ult go though Fire, Earth, Water, Air.  his q can be a spike with Earth rock something looks like malphites, His w can be air the sound and effect of like clouds and storms idk, His e can be water he turns into a water blob and hits the ground and his passive could be fire coming back together. 
> I find heaps of things that could work but yeh is it possible to make into a skin…

Good idea not practical, they wont add new features AND a skin just for one skin, q doing more then it initially does would be a #scandal

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-05-26T10:06:09.849+0000)
>
> Good idea not practical, they wont add new features AND a skin just for one skin, q doing more then it initially does would be a #scandal

How would it be new features What about other skins with their new features hay. It would be like around 1350-1820 so it has to be completely different but still have the feel of zac 
And how is q doing more, its like the new lee skin, they changed it into a punching glove thats takes more then making his arm into a spike shape ??……
dont know what the heck shuffledpancake was talking about XD.

> [{quoted}](name=ImDuhN00B,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=JJs7EFUJ,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-05-26T10:29:36.440+0000)
>
> How would it be new features What about other skins with their new features hay. It would be like around 1350-1820 so it has to be completely different but still have the feel of zac 
> And how is q doing more, its like the new lee skin, they changed it into a punching glove thats takes more then making his arm into a spike shape ??……

*his q can be a spike with Earth rock something looks like malphites* That is adding new features, not making them different colours textures etc (it would be a visual update)
What about a molten or magma Zac? like light the guy on fire like Brand..

Molten Zac.

Mud Zac

Mercury Zac.

I'd pay high cash for a Mecha Zac, now here me out. He doesnt need to look like a blog, since when have skins ever stuck to their original skin ideas? 

Passive: His abilities cause damage to himself duh, so dropping pieces of metal, parts ect ect, and when he dies....well have you seen the Iron giant? Just have his limbs crawl back to the centre
Q: An explosive punch
W: A god damn explosion
E: I propose he transforms (transformer style) into a damn rocket and fires himself
R: Transforms into all types of objects on each bounce aka bomb, spikeball, weight ect ect, or hell he can just jump into the air and stomp back down each time.

He doesnt need to look like a blob.
{{champion:154}} &{{champion:238}} are both crying.Rito must really hate champs starting with the letter 'z' lol
They already mentioned in a post the Pool Party Zac skin just give them some time for it to arrive.
I'm pretty sure that 2 years is enough time.. ggwp rito
Nah they will just make another ezreal skin lol
Urgot needs more skins ;)
Pool party/School girl Urgot for the win
Pretty sure they are very popular and very balanced (kek)
Once they do make him a skin anything less then a 1820 tier one would be a slap in the face, if his second skin is just some shitty 975 after 2 years of waiting people are gonna be pissed.
haha imagine they make a 520 skin and then never make another
